name: Graphing and interpreting points in the first quadrant (in context)

skills.name: Mark or describe a point in the first quadrant of a 2D grid in context

explanations.A: This shows that if there are 4 people they will need 0 kayaks... Where is the point which shows 4 people and 2 kayaks?
explanations.B: We need the point that shows if there are 4 people they will need 2 kayaks so we find 4 people on the x-axis and 2 kayaks on the y-axis then find where they meet which is point B!
explanations.C: This shows that if there are 0 people they will need 2 kayaks... Where is the point which shows 4 people and 2 kayaks?
explanations.D: This shows that if there are 2 people they will need 4 kayaks, you have accidentally swapped round the axes... Can you find 4 people and 2 kayaks?

explanations.A: We need the point that shows if there are 3 people they will need 1 kayak, so we find 3 people on the x-axis and 1 kayak on the y-axis. Then we find where they meet, which is point A.
explanations.B: This shows that if there are 3 people they will need 5 kayaks... Where is the point which shows 3 people and 1 kayak?
explanations.C: This shows that if there are 0 people they will need 3 kayaks... Where is the point which shows 3 people and 1 kayak?
explanations.D: This shows that if there is 1 person they will need 3 kayaks! You have accidentally swapped round the axes... Can you find 3 people and 1 kayak?

explanations.A: This shows 0 coloring packs have 8 crayons... You need to go along to 2 on the x-axis and then up to 8 on the y-axis
explanations.B: We need the point that shows if there are 2 coloring packs there are 8 crayons so we find 2 coloring packs on the x-axis and 8 crayons on the y-axis then find where they meet which is point B!
explanations.C: This shows 2 coloring packs have 0 crayons... You have correctly gone along 2 on the x-axis but you need to go up to 8 on the y-axis
explanations.D: This shows that if there are 8 coloring packs there are 2 crayons, you have accidentally swapped round the axes... Can you find 2 coloring packs and 8 crayons?

explanations.A: This shows 0 coloring packs have 9 crayons... You need to go along to 3 on the x-axis and then up to 9 on the y-axis.
explanations.B: We need the point that shows if there are 3 coloring packs there are 9 crayons, so we find 3 coloring packs on the x-axis and 9 crayons on the y-axis. Then we find where they meet, which is point B.
explanations.C: This shows 3 coloring packs have 0 crayons... You have correctly gone along 3 on the x-axis but you need to go up to 9 on the y-axis
explanations.D: This shows that if there are 9 coloring packs there are only 3 crayons - you have accidentally swapped round the axes. Can you find 3 coloring packs and 9 crayons?

explanations.A: The coordinates of the star are not (2,2), what are they? So how many marshmallows do you get with 2 sundaes?
explanations.B: I think you have mixed up the x and y axes. Look carefully at the labels, what does each axis represent?
explanations.C: We can see the star is at the coordinates (2,4) this means we have gone along 2 on the x-axis which represents the number of sundaes and we have gone along 4 on the y-axis which represents the number of giant marshmallows therefore for every 2 sundaes there are 4 marshmallows.
explanations.D: The coordinates of the star are not (2,0), what are they? So how many marshmallows do you get with 2 sundaes?

explanations.A: The coordinates of the star are not (1,3), what are they? So how many marshmallows do you get with 2 sundaes?
explanations.B: I think you have mixed up the x and y axes. Look carefully at the labels, what does each axis represent?
explanations.C: The star is at the coordinates (2,3). 2 along the x-axis which represents the number of sundaes, and 3 on the y-axis which represents the number of giant marshmallows, therefore for every 2 sundaes there are 3 marshmallows.
explanations.D: The coordinates of the star are not (2,0), what are they? So how many marshmallows do you get with 2 sundaes?

explanations.A: You have swapped round x and y. The movie theater is at the coordinates (3,4)...
explanations.B: The coordinates (4,3) mean we go along the x-axis 4 and then up the y-axis 3. This gets us to the picture of the grocery bag which, looking at the key, represents a grocery store!
explanations.C: The pet store is at the coordinates (0,3) so it's at the correct height in the y-direction but you need to go along 4 in the x-direction...
explanations.D: The hospital is at the coordinates (4,0) so you've gone along 4 correctly in the x-direction and now you need to go up 3 in the y-direction...

explanations.A: The hospital is at the coordinates (3,0) so you've correctly gone along 3 in the x-direction. Now you need to go up 2 in the y-direction.
explanations.B: You have swapped x and y. The movie theater is at the coordinates (2,3)...
explanations.C: Not quite - the pet store is in the middle of a square, so its coordinates would be (3.5, 2.5). We want the point directly above the number 3 and along from the number 2.
explanations.D: The coordinates (3,2) mean we go along the x-axis 3 and then up the y-axis 2. This gets us to the picture of the 3D glasses which, looking at the key, represent a movie theater.

explanations.A: If we go 4 along the x-axis and 3 up the y-axis we get to the pet store. If we repeat this process but for 3 along the x-axis and 4 along the y-axis we get to the movie theater. Therefore if you move from (4,3) to (3,4) you are moving from the pet store to the movie theater.
explanations.B: You have correctly identified the pet store is at (4,3) but the grocery store is at (4,0). What is at (3,4)?
explanations.C: This would be if you were going from (3,4) to (4,3)...
explanations.D: You have correctly identified the movie theater is at (3,4) but the grocery store is at (4,0). What is at (4,3)?

explanations.A: This would be if you were going from (0,2) to (2,0)...
explanations.B: This would be if you were going from (2,0) to (0,2)...
explanations.C: If we go 1 along the x-axis and 2 up the y-axis, we get to the movie theater. If we go 2 along the x-axis and 1 up the y-axis, we get to the grocery store. Therefore if you move from (1,2) to (2,1) you are moving from the movie theater to the grocery store.
explanations.D: This would be if you were going from (2,1) to (1,2)...
